activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11997
activity.text:
hmm haven't tried tj-actions/changed-files but from what i know of it, it allows for conditional job runs rather skipping entire workflows. In the case of cypress test there's only one job so in my opinion (for now) we should stick with default filters from github (`paths` and `paths-ignore`)

if you want to pick this issue up, do go ahead and start a discussion in the care_engineering channel for better suggestion from people far better than me : )

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10520
activity.text:
I think the issue is happening because the `/previous/` route is getting added to the request URL, which is causing the 'Not Found' error. I believe the fix might be in `QuestionnaireSearch.tsx`, `QuestionnaireApi.ts`, and `QuestionnaireForm.tsx`, but I wanted to confirm if I'm on the right track. Could you help clarify how the URLs are being formed? Also, any guidance on how to move forward would be great! ü§î

CC: @rithviknishad
